thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Nick D.

author: Nick D.
title: Nick D.
text: Can't say enough good things about this company. My rep Mike was really patient and explained everything well throughout the rather lengthy process as my company weighed a variety of different options for a number of months. It wasn't a huge order by any means but Mike treated us with the respect one would expect if we were a massive company with a huge order. And in the end the product was gorgeous and exactly what we needed and wanted. Couldn't have gone better from start to finish.
